description.value: You wrap the target in purifying flames. You can attempt to counteract a single poison or non-curse effect imparting the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied}condition. The target can choose to empower the flames with their life force, becoming @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 1} (or increasing their drained value by 1, if already under the condition) to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to your counteract check.
